item.description:
On the first Friday of each month, the SOWA Artists Guild hosts an Open Studio at 450 Harrison Avenue. Guild artists are on hand to talk about their work.

The gallery is open from 5-9pm. I'll be arriving around 6:30, and staying for drinks in the area afterwards.

Hope to see you there. Feel free to bring a friend.

Jenny


Directions on website: Accessible by T or by car.
(The SOWA website has the date listed as Feb 2nd, but I checked and it's the 6th)
item.name: First Fridays - open studio hosted by the SOWA Artists Guild
